data.comment: The big names in today's match at Asiad Main Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Asiad Main Stadium.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Pohang Steelers.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lee Dong-jun.
Throw-in high up the field for Busan in Busan.
In the minute 5, Pohang Steelers's Kim Sang-won has been booked in Busan.
Lee Dong-jun returns to the field for Busan after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 8, Free kick Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Busan.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
In the minute 12, Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Busan.
Kang Min-soo puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 15, Lee Jung-hyub with an assist there.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a throw-in for Pohang Steelers, close to Busan's area.
In the minute 18, Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Hyung-Jin Ko.
In Busan Pohang Steelers drive forward through Song Min-kyu. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
In the minute 21, Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers close to the penalty box.
In the minute 23, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Busan's half.
Hyung-Jin Ko awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half?
Pohang Steelers's Lee Seung-mo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
In Busan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
Pohang Steelers push forward at Asiad Main Stadium and Aleksandar Palocevic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Busan defence.
Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
In the minute 34, Busan have been given a penalty...
Busan are going well in Busan. They now lead 2-0 thanks to a Lee Jung-hyub penalty.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Busan.
In the minute 38, Hyung-Jin Ko awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
Hyung-Jin Ko awards the home team a throw-in.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick Busan.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Busanâ€™s Park Jong-woo is on his feet again at Asiad Main Stadium.
Pohang Steelers drive upfield and Song Min-kyu gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Busan defender.
In the minute 43, Park Jong-woo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 45, Busan have a goal kick.
At Asiad Main Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Busan.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Asiad Main Stadium.
The away team replace Lee Seung-mo with Lee Kwang-hyeok.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
In the minute 48, Lee Dong-jun of Busan gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Busan.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Busan.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a Busan throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 52, Pohang Steelers's Stanislav Iljutcenko breaks free at Asiad Main Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Hyung-Jin Ko awards Busan a goal kick.
Throw-in for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
In the minute 54, Lee Dong-jun (Busan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Busan.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Busan needs to be cautious. Pohang Steelers have an attacking throw-in.
Busan to take a throw-in in Pohang Steelers territory.
In the minute 56, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Busan's half.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half?
In Busan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 58, Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a strike by Lee Kwang-hyeok. .
Aleksandar Palocevic instrumental with a fine assist.
Busan's Lee Dong-jun gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 60, Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 63, Aleksandar Palocevic is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Can Pohang Steelers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Busan's half?
In the minute 65, Pohang Steelers have a dangerous throw-in.
Lee Kwang-hyeok hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Busan for Pohang Steelers.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
In the minute 66, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In Busan Pohang Steelers attack through Manuel Palacios. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Busan.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Park Jun-kang for Busan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 72, Busan's Park Jun-kang looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Busan.
Goal kick for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
In the minute 74, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Busan.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers close to the penalty box.
Gi Dong Kim (Pohang Steelers) is making a second substitution, with Go Young-jun replacing Manuel Palacios.
In the minute 76, Hyung-Jin Ko awards Busan a goal kick.
Kim Seung-jun is on a sub for Kim Byong-oh for Busan.
Pohang Steelers's Aleksandar Palocevic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Busan defender.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Busan drives forward and Kim Seung-jun gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Gustavo Vintecinco is replacing Lee Jung-hyub for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
Aleksandar Palocevic for Pohang Steelers drives towards goal at Asiad Main Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
In the minute 81, Kim Sang-won in Pohang Steelers has been yellow-carded a second time by Hyung-Jin Ko and is being sent off.
Free kick Busan.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Busan.
Kim Dong-woo of Busan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Hyung-Jin Ko.
In the minute 86, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Park Jae-woo (Pohang Steelers) strikes at Asiad Main Stadium but his header is cleared.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Pohang Steelers make their third substitution with Jun jae Nam replacing Song Min-kyu.
Busan are in shooting range from this free kick.
Kim Kwang-seok for Pohang Steelers has been booked by Hyung-Jin Ko and receives a first yellow card.
Important block from the Pohang Steelers defence as Park Jong-woo fires in a strike for Busan.
Corner awarded to Busan.
Gustavo Vintecinco (Busan) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
In Busan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a throw-in for Pohang Steelers, close to Busan's area.
In Busan, Lee Kwang-hyeok of Pohang Steelers is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as Pohang Steelers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Busan.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Pohang Steelers.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Kim Myeong-jun is replacing Lee Kyu-seong for the home team.
Jeon Min-kwang (Pohang Steelers) has received a first yellow card.
